## Quarto

Quarto enables you to weave together content and executable code into a finished document. To learn more about Quarto see <https://quarto.org>.

Data[Condition ,] on selectionne par ligne
Data[, Indice/Name] on selectionne par colonne
```{r}
## Sommaire du datset --
## Les "NA" indique des valeurs manquantes
summary(airquality)


### Pour supprimer des valeurs manquantes 
#|echo:false
airquality[,"Ozone"]
airquality[,1]
is.na(airquality)

# On selectionne les lignes sans valeurs manquante sur Ozone
airquality_cleanUp1 = airquality[ ! is.na(airquality$Ozone), ]
airquality[,1]
dim(airquality_cleanUp1)


# On selectionne les lignes sans valeurs manquante sur radiation
airquality_cleanUp2 = airquality_cleanUp1[ ! is.na(airquality_cleanUp1$Radiation), ]
dim(airquality_cleanUp2)
summary(airquality_cleanUp2)


airquality_net = na.omit(airquality)
summary(airquality_net)
```


# Histogramme

```{r}
hist(airquality_net$Ozone)
```
You can add options to executable code like this

```{r}
#| echo: false
2 * 2
1 + 1
payed=c(0,1,0,0,1)
ifelse(payed==0,"nonPaye","Paye")
print('---------------')
M=matrix(c(1,4,7,2,5,8,3,6,9), ncol=3)
M
print('---------------')
```

The `echo: false` option disables the printing of code (only output is displayed).
